title: Fail to redeploy Operations Orchestration in Suite Administration
content:
Subsequent attempts to redeploy the Operations Orchestration (OO) capability will fail once you encounter the following error in Autopass for an OO deployment.

Failed to get license list for tenant with ID <tenant_id> in APLS

Cause

Failure to create the schema in the Autopass database due to insufficient connections configured for the PostgreSQL database. 

Solution

  1. Log in to the OO AutoPass License Server https://<OO_HOST>:<OO_PORT>/autopass as a suite administrator.
  2. If you can get a 403 error, perform the below steps to get permissions to access OO AutoPass.
    1. Log in to IDM server https://<HOST>:<PORT>/idm-admin. 
    2. In the Organization tab, select SYSBO.
    3. Select Roles on the left pane.
    4. On the Roles page, search for Super IDM Admin and select it.
    5. In Associated Permissions, add the permission Autopass_Admin.
    6. Save the changes.
    7. Verify that the suite administrator has Autopass_Admin permissions. 
  3. Select  from the right-hand top icons to see the list of tenants. 
  4. Select the Tenant ID for which the OO deployment has failed and delete it.
  5. After successful deletion, log in to Suite Administration and redeploy the OO capability for the tenant.
